resources.string: Do you want to exit TourMe?

Welcome to TourMe, your ultimate guide to friendly local tours in your own language. 

You must first purchase a tour by visiting: 
www.tours.com and selecting the "add to account" menu. The tour will be downloaded to your phone the next time you are in an area with wifi and open the application. 

 The "Applications" button on the homescreen leads to a map that shows the walking directions for each stop, along with a videos and pictures of each location, as well as audio in a language you select. 

 The "Maps" button provides local eateries and entertainment, as well as pictures of local attractions. You can also take a snapshot of anything of interest to a tourist for others to enjoy. 

 We hope you'll like spending time in your new country in your own language!
